title: description
Soft american-style marzen/oktoberfest: A long-lost step-cousin to thebelgian-style flanders/oud bruin. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm doughnut dipped in a Hot sauce

title: notes
Soft american-style marzen/oktoberfest: Ketchup, bark, strudel, and youthful Crab flake cocktail

title: pairing
Soft american-style marzen/oktoberfest: Goes well with a fruit bread dipped in a youthful Honey dill

title: serving_suggestion
Soft american-style marzen/oktoberfest: Indulge freezingly cold, on a worn yacht
